document_data.mainbody:
haviklo Nathalar was an aging famed actor who performed at the famous Crown Aflame theater in Athkatla in the late 14 century DR.
Even in his later years, Mhaviklo was described as handsome and magnificent.
"Lord" Mhaviklo Nathalars long career included many paid speeches for noble families, many heart-broken lasses, becoming the leader of several acting troupes, and even achieving the title of a guildmaster of an actors guild somewhere far away from Amn. As of , Halvaruth was still performing at the Crown Aflame but was semi-retired. His renown and height of acting skills brought many amateur actors under his tutelage in the late 14 century DR.
